concept.title: Known Issues
concept.shortdesc: This topic lists known issues in HPE Helion Eucalyptus 4.2.2 and its dependencies.

conbody.p: Please contact Eucalyptus Support for known workarounds to these issues.

p.b: New known issues for this release:

tbody.row: <<<<<<< HEAD TBD (EUCA-TBD) TBD ======= Cannot login to UI when console.ini setting 'session.cookie_expires' set at or below 28800 (GUI-1592) Please see linked bug for more information. >>>>>>> 4.2.1

p.b: Outstanding known issues from previous releases:

row.entry: Security group rules using instances Public IP are not enforced in MANAGED mode (EUCA-11476)

Security group rules are enforced in the FORWARD chain, which is processed before POSTROUTING (where SNAT happens). Thus, security group rules that use instances public IP addresses will not match in FORWARD chain (packets will have instances' private IP address in the FORWARD chain). See linked bug for more information.
